post.description:
API to fetch Device Inventory details for reporting
Endpoint:
    internal/v1/reports/device-inventory
Request Body: (Filters)
    {
        "columns": Device Inventory fields to be displayed in the report
        "search_string": "string",
        "display_device_types": "string",
        "application_ids": "string",
        "archive_visibility": "HIDE_ARCHIVED",
        "tenant_platform_customer_id": "string",
        "serial_number": "string",
        "part_number": "string",
        "device_type": "AP",
        "tags": [
            {
                "name": "string",
                "value": "string",
                "created_by": "string"
            }
        ],
        "unassigned_only": true,
        "application_customer_ids": [
            "string"
        ],
        "subscription_tier": "string",
        "subscription_end_date_in_millis": int,
        "device_license_type: "string",
        "apps": "string"
    }
